name: Hacktoberfest-Leaderboard
description: Make the hacktoberfest a competition with a leaderboard

GH_TOKEN.description: The github token used to authenticate to github API

EVENT_DATE.description: The date criteria used to fetch data from github, in the github search format. See https://help.github.com/articles/understanding-the-search-syntax/#query-for-dates

PARTICIPANTS_FILE.description: URI to the file containing the list of participants. Can be a local or a remote file

OBJECTIVE.description: Number of pull requests to make in order to complete the challenge
